long_description: Destined for mud, sweat and glory, the Raleigh RX 1.0 men's cyclocross bike takes you over all the mixed and dirt tracks on your favorite cyclocross courses. Butted aluminum frame delivers a great balance of stiffness and light weight; carbon fork further reduces weight and supplies sure steering. FSA Gossamer Cross crankset is outfitted with 46/36 chainrings for just-right 'cross gearing. SRAM shifters and derailleurs supply solid shifting performance. Bar-top Tektro RL721 brake levers give you braking control when you're riding on top of the bars; SRAM Apex integrated levers let you brake when you're in the drops. Easily adjustable Tektro CR710 cantilever brakes offer plenty of mud and grass clearance. Highly puncture-resistant Schwalbe Racing Ralph tires provide tons of bite for muddy endeavors. Specs on the Raleigh RX 1.0 men's cyclocross bike are subject to change.
